license.hwidHelp: To purchase a full license, you must provide the following Hardware ID. This locks the license to this specific computer.

steps.s1: Copy your unique Hardware ID from above.
steps.s2: Visit our website and purchase a license using your Hardware ID.
steps.s3: You will receive a `license.key` file via email.
steps.s4: Place the `license.key` file in the same folder as the `POSPal.exe` application.
steps.s5: Restart the POSPal application to activate the full version.

offlineModal.title: Internet connection lost - POS running in grace mode
offlineModal.summary: We can't reach the licensing service right now. POSPal will keep working using the last verified license.
offlineModal.detail: The internet connection dropped, so we're using cached license data. Orders, payments, and printing continue to work normally.
offlineModal.note: POSPal tracks how long we run offline. If the grace period expires before internet returns, licensing features may pause. Resolve connectivity as soon as possible.

message.unreachable: Cannot reach the licensing service. POSPal is running in grace mode.

step.checkRouter: Check the modem/router and ensure cables are connected.
step.contactProvider: If the internet outage persists, contact your internet provider.
step.retry: Once you're back online, click retry below to restore full licensing sync.
step.checkNetwork: Check the router or internet modem and make sure cables and power are secure.
step.verifyLan: Verify the POS server still has LAN access. If needed, restart the router or modem.
